code:
gantt
    title erlmcp Feature Development Timeline - Through Q2 2026
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD

    section Core Protocol (Infra_WorkerNode)
    OTP 28.3.1 Migration             :core1, 2026-01-01, 2026-01-31
    Native JSON Module              :core2, 2026-01-01, 2w
    Priority Messages (Infra_RedisCache)      :core3, 2026-01-15, 2w
    Process Iteration API           :core4, 2026-01-22, 2w

    section Transports Layer
    WebSocket Transport             :trans1, 2026-02-01, 2w
    SSE Transport                   :trans2, 2026-02-15, 2w
    GraphQL Transport               :trans3, 2026-03-01, 3w
    HTTP/3 Transport (Infra_WorkerNode)         :trans4, 2026-04-15, 4w

    section Observability
    OpenTelemetry Integration        :obs1, 2026-01-15, 3w
    Chaos Engineering Framework      :obs2, 2026-02-15, 4w
    Metrics Dashboard                :obs3, 2026-03-01, 3w
    Distributed Tracing              :obs4, 2026-03-15, 3w

    section Scalability (Infra_RedisCache)
    Foundation Phase                :scal1, 2026-02-03, 2w
    Capacity Increase                :scal2, 2026-02-17, 4w
    Full Scaling                     :scal3, 2026-03-17, 6w

    section Quality & Validation
    TCPS Quality Gates              :qual1, 2026-01-01, 2026-01-31
    Protocol Validator              :qual2, 2026-02-01, 3w
    Security Validator              :qual3, 2026-02-15, 3w
    Performance Validator           :qual4, 2026-03-01, 4w
    Compliance Reporting            :qual5, 2026-03-15, 3w

    section Operations
    CI/CD Workflows                 :ops1, 2026-01-01, 2w
    Deployment Automation           :ops2, 2026-02-01, 3w
    Monitoring Stack                :ops3, 2026-02-15, 4w
    Incident Response Runbooks      :ops4, 2026-03-15, 3w

    section Documentation
    API Reference                   :doc1, 2026-01-01, 4w
    Architecture Docs               :doc2, 2026-01-15, 4w
    User Guides                     :doc3, 2026-02-01, 4w
    Tutorial Examples               :doc4, 2026-02-15, 6w
repo_description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) SDK for Erlang
